summary: Removes the effect that the disintegrate perk causes on creatures and people when killed so you can once again raise dead or enjoy watching your character absorb dragon souls and not just have things you kill disappear and turn into a small pile of ash.
descriptionHtml:
Removes the effect that the disintegrate perk causes on creatures and people when killed so you can once again raise dead or enjoy watching your character absorb dragon souls and not just have things you kill disappear and turn into a small pile of ash.

Note that this mod does not affect this perk in any other way, you still instantly kill all enemies with 15% or less when using shock spells.
author: Eternaldarkfire
